data.name: SNOW - Snowboard Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dress to impress in SNOW with the Snowboard Starter Pack!
This DLC comes with an entire outfit at a 30% discount, and features 500 Credits to spend in the SNOW store on new mountains or feature unlocks like the Prop Tool or Snowmobile.

Included in this DLC (see below for images):
  • 500 Credits to spend in the SNOW Store
  • Lib Tech Glacier hat
  • Von Zipper Cleaver goggles
  • Von Zipper hoodie
  • Faction Marconi pants
  • DC Supply Mitts
  • Ride Triad boots
  • DC Mega 156 snowboard
  • Ride Revolt bindings

In addition to the 500 Credits, the following items are included in this pack:

data.short_description: Dress to impress in SNOW with the Snowboard Starter Pack! This DLC comes with a 30% discount and features 500 Credits to spend in the SNOW store on new mountains or feature unlocks like the Prop Tool or Snowmobile.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements are provided as a baseline for development, but are not guaranteed due to the game currently being in development. Requirements may be changed as the game progresses. Note: Integrated graphics cards are not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The system requirements are provided as a baseline for development, but are not guaranteed due to the game currently being in development. Requirements may be changed as the game progresses. Note: Integrated graphics cards are not supported.
